title: ESIC Karnataka Recruitment 2026 - Walk-in-Interview for 47 Senior Resident Posts
description: Employees' State Insurance Corporation (ESIC Karnataka) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for 47 Senior Resident Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MD/ MS, DNB, and Post-Graduation can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the ESIC Karnataka Recruitment 2026 . Interested candidates can attend the walk-in at th...
